title: Google\Cloud\SecurityCenter\V1p1beta1\UpdateSecurityMarksRequest
name: UpdateSecurityMarksRequest
description:
Request message for updating a SecurityMarks resource.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.securitycenter.v1p1beta1.UpdateSecurityMarksRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.security_marks
params.description: Required. The security marks resource to update.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: The FieldMask to use when updating the security marks resource. The field mask must not contain duplicate fields. If empty or set to "marks", all marks will be replaced. Individual marks can be updated using "marks.".

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: The time at which the updated SecurityMarks take effect. If not set uses current server time. Updates will be applied to the SecurityMarks that are active immediately preceding this time.
